hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Lens of Truth# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Song of Storms#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Recovery Heart#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Heavy Block First Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Water Temple Small Key#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that ##Dodongo's Cavern## has #6# major items.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals a #generic grotto#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #a Bottom of the Well Small Key# can be found at #Zora's River#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say Ingo is not very good at planning ahead.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #Goron Pot's happy face# spits out #a Red Rupee#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Song of Storms#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key# can be found in #the Thieves' Hideout#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path to the #Goron Ruby#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 4 Bottom

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Zora Scale#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the final item you're looking for can be found somewhere in Hyrule.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #a Hookshot# can be found at #Zora's River#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Volvagia# holds...^ #a Red Rupee# and #a Recovery Heart#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo Valley# is a foolish choice.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals #2 Deku Scrubs#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #collecting cuccos# rewards #a Red Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that plundering #the Deku Tree# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Zora Scale#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Dead Hand in the well# guards...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Lens of Truth Chest
Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest

ToT (Right).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Stray Fairy#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the way of the hero.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Water Trial Left Chest

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that ##the Gerudo Training Ground## has #1# major item.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that ##the Market## has #3# major items.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Water Temple Small Key#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals a #generic grotto#.
